articles.author: Anna Mutoh
articles.title: New JN. 1 Covid variant gains ground in US ahead of holiday season - Financial Times
articles.description: Americans’ interest in vaccinations has flagged despite efforts to boost uptake of latest jab
articles.content:
A new variant of Covid-19 is spreading rapidly across the US this holiday season, even as Americans interest in getting vaccinated has faded.  
JN. 1, a sub-variant of Omicron that has an additional… [+3113 chars]
